content.detailedDescription: On january 17, 2009, my wife and i were going home from a party at some friends house. i saw some strange looking lights traveling from the nw to the se over the country club plaza in kansas city,mo. we pulled off the road as i wanted to get a better look. i observed 5 lights in a vee or triangular pattern. it seemed to be very big in size, moving very slow and not changing its direction. what was strange to me was, as an airline employee, i am well aware that all aircraft have to have certain directional lights to easily identify which direction it is traveling relative to your position of observation. there was none observed with any of these lights. i am curious if i am the only one to report this sighting. i know what i saw, and i hadn't drank a drop of alcohol for over 4 years.
content.summary: Saw a number of lights  in a vee or triangular pattern flying over the country club plaza in kansas city, mo.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving me and my freind and at 1030 pm around that time while south bound to oregon city on the highway from madison wi we noticed a object with a white light zig zag very fast high in the sky and then it disappeared.
content.summary: Changed directions in sky very fast white bright light and then it disappeared

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Not going to answer all those questions buti know now i was 12 and i know what i saw for sure 100% if you want my story it's called the cash landrum siting. i was 12 and all i can tell you is what i saw and then my story after the siting...
content.summary: Fire ball

content.detailedDescription: Last year i had been recording the daily chem-trails being sprayed each day before sunrise.  almost a year later i was watching these videos with some friends when i noticed a glowing object descend, change direction and then fly off.  after slowing the video down and watching it several more times i began to notice the object appears in the upper right-hand area of the screen at 5 seconds in as a small, dark stationary object.  the camera pans away from the object momentarily and then from the same area that the object left the screen it can again be seen descending and becoming more apparent.  the object then suddenly begins to brighten and appears to change direction away from the camera and fades out of sight at what seemed to be a rapid pace.  being a strong believer in the ufo phenomena and a fan of watching the many ufo videos on the internet i must say i was rather elated at discovering i had actually captured an event such as this.  hopefully this footage will be of some use in the ongoing investigation in the ufo mystery.
content.summary: Ufo hovers near chem spraying jet then flies off as a glowing orb.

content.detailedDescription: There were 3 large lights that would appear and then fizzle out and reappear several times this lasted for about 2minutes and then they dropped what looked like sparks but seemed as is they were actually smaller versions of these orbs and actually went in hundreds of directions in pairs of 2. i also have 42 seconds of vedio footage that i can not successfully upload to the site.
content.summary: Extreme

content.detailedDescription: Driving in car.  saw lights in order, blue/green and orange.  covered entire sky.
content.summary: Flashes of orange and green light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: i was about 6 or 7 years old at the time . i woke up from sleep and heard my parents haveing a loud conversation . i went in to our kitchen and asked what was up ?? my father said you need to go back to bed , my mother said she thought i ought to see what was happening . my mother and i walked out to the out side steps and she told me to look at the back hay field . what i saw has stayed with me every day following this ! i still see the haze in the air around the object and the very little people walking around the object . there was no real defind shape other than it looked to be sort of oval and sort of big . the next day when i got home from school i did my chores and the went and asked my mom where my dad was . she told me he had been in the back hay field all day . i went out to the field and found my dad paceing the field from one spot to another to another . when i asked what he was looking at he pointed at the ground and i saw that there was a bare spot there . my father showed me two other bare spots in the field . i knew that there were no bare spots in the field because i had walked the field with my father the day before ! in the years following this these bare spots never grew in . my father tried every the he could think of to get something to grow in those spots . there was a picture of the object in the dexter news paper the following day of the even . i was the one who said the picture in the paper was from behind our barn . my father and mother both said it was . i knew it was from behind our barn because there was a tree in the picture in the frame with the edge of a small pond by it . then a fence and then the field with the object in it setting on the ground .
content.summary: The object landed in our back hay field . what appeared to be short people got  out by way of a ramp . they walked round the object and then got bavk in and the object took off .

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a bright light about 9:45 pm. i called my wife and she had seen it thinking it was a shooting star, until it stopped not too far from us. it was like a bright pulsating star. it made very quick changes in direction like a hummingbird, but eventually went back to its general west bound direction. there was no noise and was a delight to see it change directions as it did.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pulsating, rapidly changing trajectory but moving in one general direction  quickly changed colors

content.detailedDescription: A family member of mine knew i am in this field of research and caught some strange lights that he could not explain with his cell phone. he is ex-military and i would consider him a sound individual with good discernment. the anomalies in the video were recorded december 2nd in the evening approximately at 18:00 in vancouver, wa near the westfield shopping center. there were 4 lights that went from dim to super bright lights just hanging in the sky for 10 minutes or so and then just kind of flew off. he did not record the whole observation, rather just 2 and a half minutes of the occurrence. he thought that one of the lights could have been an airplane, but the path it took was kind of odd for an airplane not to mentions they seemed way to close together. the lights/objects were east of where he was standing. they didn't appear to be too far away, if he had to guess he would say about 5-10 miles out. they were way too low to the ground to be any type of commercial airliner in his opinion. they all seem to be hovering until the top one (shown in the video) started moving to the north/northwest.
content.summary: Strange lights caught in vancouver, wa 12/2/14

content.detailedDescription: This was a navy blue orb traveling left to right and up and down at zipping speeds... for 20 min..
content.summary: A navy blue orb traveling to and fro at awesome speeds left to right and up and down

content.detailedDescription:
I may have submitted this once before, so please excuse any duplicate info. i will go into detail below.

in april of 1981, my fiancee and i had accompanied her parents to visit her brother and family in scottsboro, alabama. i drove the entire distance in her father's car, (at that time) a late model olds cutlass coupe. we had been visiting and talking into the night and i had a beer or two. it began to get late and my fiancee (now wife, anna, of over 33 years) and i were to go stay with her brother's in-laws in town. her brother lived in a log home on a peninsula into the back waters and main channel of the tenn. river, at roseberry creek. it was populated, with some street lights, but not many. the evening was clear with few clouds and a partial full moon. (it should also be noted that just up the tenn. river, in stevenson, was, at that time, a nuclear reactor project which was in the process of being built in hollywood, just to the north of the location of this incident, the bellefont reactor project. i am not sure if there was any nuclear material at the sight at that time, as the unit is still unfinished. another site just north of the bellefont unit, at widow's creek, is coal fired and likely being shutdown.)
at around 11:30pm, we left her brother's house and began the 5-7 mile trip to the in-laws house. after about 1/4 mile, the car began to knock and shut off. the radio stopped and shut off. at the same time, a bright white light appeared over the tree line just off the road to the right (approx. to the ne). we had the windows cracked about 2 inches and noticed no crickets which we heard upon leaving the house and entering the car. the road is narrow at that point, with water on the left side and a house just prior to it. there is a street light at that point, which had also turned off when the bright light appeared.

as the intense and blinding white light shone upon us through the windshield with us trying to peer up and find out what was going on, anna asked if we should get out to see. i said "no.", also mentioning that we should stay buckled in and lock the doors, forgetting about the windows being partially down. i looked at my new seiko lcd watch and it had stopped, as the screen was blank and even the internal light would not work when i pressed the button. anna's battery powered analog watch even stopped. i don't remember the exact time, though.

after what seemed to be an eternity, the bright white light simply disappeared. no noise of any kind was heard until the radio came back on and the crickets began to chirp again. we looked at each other in shock at what had just occurred. i remember her watch having restarted, but was about 10 mins. ahead and thought that was very weird since the second hand had stopped when i looked at it while the light was present.

i started the car after putting it in park. apparently, i must have let the engine help slow us to a stop after the vacuum from the power brake booster was spent from my heavy braking. we continued on our journey to the in-laws and agreed to not speak a word of our experience as we thought people would think us crazy.

many years later, in 2007, while in chicago visiting her youngest niece from alabama (who is now an er doctor), we mentioned the above story to her from 26 years prior. she was not amazed as her grandparents whom we stayed with on that visit in 1981, had also experienced the exact same situation in the same location numerous times. they are both now deceased and cannot corroborate or tell their stories.

while i believed in ufos before 1981 (a now deceased uncle worked with the usaf's ftd group at wpafb here in dayton and was elusively frank with me when describing project blue book, using a non-denial denial phrase to let me know about this subject), i had never thought much about it for about 12 years. i don't believe i was influenced by any unconscious belief in ufos with this experience in april of 1981. however, since that time, both my wife and i are avid believers and do not push aside many stories of similar or more involved sightings. sure, the govt. could be working on secret projects and the like, but that only begs the question: where did they get the technology so quickly?
content.summary: Intense white light and power failure of car, street light, and watches

content.detailedDescription: I had just turned north off of foxtail dr. onto rocky mountain ave. in loveland's centerra shopping area, when i saw a bright orange dot, initially solid in color, appear from the top of my jeep's windshield and begin heading north.  at first i thought it was a plane landing at fort-collins/loveland airport but i quickly realized it was moving far too fast to be landing. my next assumption was that it was meteor falling from the sky; however when it didn't dissipate, as most meteorites do, i realized i must be looking at something very odd. as i looked closer i noticed that it was an almost semi-opaque but well defined circle... or orb as you people call them.  as i looked, the object very clearly changed color to a pinkish color for a few seconds and then changed back to orange. it did this a few times as it flew north but because it was moving at such a high rate of speed, i only saw it change color 4 or 5 times. it was traveling south to north, paralleling i-25 on it's west side, appearing to head to wyoming.  i watched it almost disappear into the northern horizon, to the point where you could barely see it.  it looked like a faint star very low on the horizon, maybe 5 degrees. i was having a hard time seeing it at this point, so i pulled over on the frontage road and watched it on the horizon. it didn't move for maybe 8 or 9 minutes, at which point it went straight up and disappeared.  i have never seen anything like this and have never believed in this sort of thing until now. i have been unable to sleep tonight because of it and decided i would report it. there was no sound and given how low it was initially and how fast it was going i would have assumed you would have heard a sonic boom or something. i have never seen anything move that fast!
content.summary: Orange/pink orb travels at high rate of speed over loveland/fort-collins heading north toward wyoming

content.detailedDescription: While taking a photo of the sunrise this morning, i noticed a shiny disk in my picture. i waited a few minutes and took another shot. the disc was still there. i then enlarged the photo by zooming it and noticed a bright green round sphere with white dots on it. i even took another picture of the sky and the disc was still there. i waited a few minutes and took another picture and the sky had become covered in clouds so the disk was no longer visible. i immediately contacted mufon. this occurred on december 9th at about 7 am.
content.summary: I noticed it in sunrise photos taken from my balcony. i enlarged the photo of the disk.

content.detailedDescription: 5/6 bright lights appearing then disapearing from simular altitude and location
content.summary: 5/6 bright lights appearing/disapearing from similar altitude and location

content.detailedDescription:
First sighting................ march 03, 2012 at 9:06pm		
 camera: jvc everio ms210 hdd 45x zoom lens, standard definition

saw very bright ball of light from my home office window
completely silentâ€”no sound

length of sighting approx 15 minutes

object was approx one mile away aboout 200 feet hovering and moving very slowly above desert hillside.


grabbed camera and ran outside to back yard.

neighbors camera, so was not familiar with operation of camera and it's features

first shots of object were still shots because camera was in photo mode not video
fumbled around in the dark and got video mode turn on.

started recording object in video mode.

object(s) traveled slowly in northerly direction. light abruptly went out and i stopped filming.



second sighting............... thurs march 08 at approx 9:20pm........... saw two objects.

saw two bright objects in same area as before. one object was bigger and brighter than the other.

one light would dim then disappear then would re-appear. minutes later the other light would go out or disappear, other light would appear and get really bright. 

camera was on autofocus so object kept going in and out of focus

very hard to keep in frame when zoomed in closup

even though i had anti shake feature enabled video is still very shaky especially when zoomed in close.

can here trains rumbling and horns blowing during filming. trains come thru town many times a day & night!

object was approx 1.5 mile away.

i called our local airport, they said they did not witness the object and informed me that no airplanes had taken off or landed in five days!

i have more video footage of this object available.

i never witnessed this object since. i look out of the same window to this day and never seen it again!
content.summary: Large glowing orb(s) witnessed two seperate days over desert hillside viewed from my house

content.detailedDescription: Analysis of nasa rovers' photos of mars. the opportunity rover took a photo (on sol 3,637, 18 april 2014) of the "endeavour crater rim". after analyzing said photo for a while, i focused my attention in one particular area at the base of a mountain. my surprise was great when the ufo appeared clearly. it is either hovering or flying about 500 feet above the martian ground (where structures can also be seen). this was just another clear evidence - proof - that not only is there alien activity on mars, but if ufos visit mars, they must surely also visit earth.
content.summary: Clear ufo in the mars sky

content.detailedDescription:
I dont know the exact date it was such a long time ago now but the memories of that night are still very fresh.

i was around 12 years old and lived in redcar at the time.  my parents were visiting my uncle and aunt who lived in the deens area of darlington with a direct view towards teeside airport out of their front window.

my parents, sister and aunt and uncle were all playing cards in the back room, i was listening to vinyl music in the front room laid on the couch with the lights out looking at the stars.

i observed a very bight star looking object hovering around 30 degrees in the nights sky over the direction of teeside airport which appeared to be slightly changing colours and getting brighter and dimmer at random intervals.



i went to the window to watch it because it was larger than the north star yet brighter and more intense.  i didnt know what to make of it until it moved so quickly a short distance to the left.  i at that point knew it could not be anything other than a ufo even at that age because i was such a sci-fi movie buff as a kid.

i got so excited after watching it zipping randomly across the sky above the airport i went to get my sister who would have been 16 at the time.

she alnost completely rediculed me and didnt believe a word i said that i was watching a ufo but i dragged her into the front room and told her to look out of the window.
we both watched what seemed to be for 10 minutes or more as it moved, changed colours, flickered and pulsated in the sky.

the next thing shocked me even more when i obsurved the lights of aircraft taking off and rising into the air in persuit of the ufo.

the ufo then made several eratic moves in the sky, still at around 30-45 degrees per my view and shot off at incredible speed in a sw direction over the house and away from the airport.

both my sister and myself witnessed the ufo but i almost watched it all.

the very next day it was on the local radio statio  and in the papers that hundreds of people had witnessed ufo activity above teeside airport in county durham england during the night which confirmed what i had seen.

did anyone else witness this.  does anyone have any more info on this.

i have burried this for 35 years and it still on my mind today.

please contact if you know any more info on this sighting
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo spotted over teeside airport

content.detailedDescription: Three nights ago(12/07/2014) me and my girlfriend decided to watch the stars because of the huge gorgeous halo that's been around the moon the last few nights and while watching we saw a single dim green light fly over the entire horizon from w-nw to e in less than 4 seconds it covered the distance of the entire horizon,  because of this strange sighting we decided to spend time star watching again last tonight, (12/08/2014 approx. 10pm pst), i was standing looking straight up at the area between perseus, triangulum, andromeda & casiopa roughly at 10pm and i saw 3 very dim bluesh green lights appear where there were no stars before, the relative size would be about 3 fingers with thumb and pinky finger tucked in held out at arms length from the left light to the right light (there was a left, right and middle point of blueish greenish light), as soon as it appeared the three points of light moved together in perfect unison as if they were all attached to an invisible transparent craft or held together in some way... it moved extremely strangely if you imagine it as three points of light attached to a transparent craft it moved like an icecube melting on a hot plate slowly at first in a north west direction then did a fast sweeping turn upward toward the west (left turn) as it was turning, the left and right point of light came closer to the center point of light as if the invisible craft shrunk or folded in on itself(almost as if it was getting smaller to avoid g forces), it made a full left turn as it grew smaller then when done turning it re-expanded to the previous size and slowed to previous speed and the three lights began to grow dim and then it just dissapeared. i feel like i could see a faint triangular distortion when it moved quickly as if the craft was invisible but distorted the stars/sky around it when accelerating, if you imagine it as a triangle with a leading edge point the three lights would be on the back left, back right, and back middle, there was no light on the leading edge point, just three dim blueish green lights in a straight row moving as one and changing size. the whole sighting lasted about 6-8 seconds and it appeared to be literally in space, this did not appear close like it was in our atmosphere, to me it appeared that it was one invisible craft holding the three points of light together it would have been far away in space and at least twice the width/size of our moon, it was just incredible in size for how far away it appeared to be. it's possible that it was three seperate points of blue light intelligently moving as one but it truly did appear like three points of light held together by an invisible trangular shaped craft where you could see the distortion of the rest of the body when it picked up speed. as i began to see it i yelled to my father wo was 5 feet away inside our studio doorway: "look look look look look look  look look there" pointed "look do you see it? look *points again*" he ran out of our studio and look up where i was pointing and his jaw dropped... afterwards we discussed it and it was as if he saw the very last second of its flight where it made a full left sweeping turn and slowed and blinked out, he describes it as a streak of blueish dim light swirling across and disappearing, it was like he did not see enough of it to process the shape or arrangement but did see enough of it to know that he/we definitely saw something other-wordly -- he is certain of that. sadly my girlfriend went to the restroom just before it appeared and missed it or i would have three witnesses to this sighting.. me and the girlfriend did drive up to spyglass hill later on around 12-3am and she saw something completely different but just as other-wordly that i did not see and can't even begin to describe -- just as other worldly as my sighting earlier was, but i will leave it up to her if she feels brave enough to file a report for herself on what she witnessed. i have attached/included my best attempt at a video recreation of what i saw, it's a little choppy i am no pro with this type of stop frame video animation stuff. i'm posting this because i would really like to hear if anyone else out there just so happened to be watching the sky at the same time as me and witnessed this incredible event, if you did witness this, and or if you know anything about what i saw or what this could be, please speak up, i will be watching the comments, and the skies more often from now on. thank you.
content.summary: 3 semi-dim greenish blueish lights in a row appear to fly as one object & grow closer together as it made a sharp quick sweeping turn

content.detailedDescription: On the way home from eating out at a restaurant my dad noticed a flashing light in the sky at first he thought it was a plane but it was to bright and unexpected to be a plane. it was a extremely bright star looking light that would go bright then disappear then go bright again then disappear then another 2nd ball showed up in another location near by to the left of it and also flashed then a line of 4 balls of light lit up side by side like so ( o o o o ) one more light appeared far below the 4 lights then they all faded out at the same time and disappeared. after that we noticed many planes heading toward that direction coming in from opposite areas it was happening.
content.summary: Driving home saw 4-5 balls of light flashing randomly in sky single to multiple

content.detailedDescription: I was helping a friend work on vehicle in his back yard when i saw what i thought was 2 airplanes flying very close together at same altitude traveling same flight path, it was dark already, then flashed white and red lights, i have never seen 2 planes flying that close together so i watched them for a bit thinking they would eventually head off in different directions, they were coming from south east of my position, they passed me and i was now watching them facing a north west position when all the sudden a third light came rocketing from in between the 2 flashing objects then the original two objects followed in line making a quick   circle in air then forming a triangle pattern after that 2 objects took off to the north west and disappeared in 2 seconds but the third ascended a bit and hung like a orange colored star in the sky for several hours it did not blink just hovered in place. after the incident took place several jets where in air spraying chem trails and a helicopter was buzzing around.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Starnge behavior for planes

content.detailedDescription:
Good afternoon, 
i am having a lot of trouble wrapping my head around what i witnessed on october 10 2014 and am hoping you can help. 

i was watching live coverage of a local football game being played at nelson high school when at a stoppage in the game, the cameraman points his camera up towards the fantastic full moon that was on display that night. as it was pointed up there, i noticed out of their corner of my eye a weird blue light that looked like an explosion just left of the moon and it caught me really off guard. luckily i was able to rewind the footage and watch it over again. the more i watched this ten second clip, the more i discovered. coming in from the east at an incredible speed i see a craft coming in on a straight path just past the moon. right behind it there is another craft that appears to be chasing it. the smaller craft then catches up to the larger one which prompts it to make a sharp turn away as if it's trying to lose the smaller craft. with them going this speed i just don't see how any human aircraft could maneuver like that. if i wasn't able to slow down the footage i wouldn't have even been able to make these out that's how fast they were moving. as this is going on, i witnessed another craft in the centre of the screen that is hovering beneath the moon for a few seconds and then suddenly it begins to ascend up toward the moon and it disappeared at the exact time the blue light i had mentioned began to appear. i then discovered that at the same time the blue shockwave/explosion appears there is also a large green shockwave that comes up from the earth almost as if it is connected to the blue light. 

after the blue explosion happens, i see two more crafts coming east to west across the screen as if they are chasing each other like the ones before. as the smaller craft gets closer all of a sudden the larger craft is able to come to a complete stop and begins to hover as the other craft passes it and disappears. with the speeds these were going and then seeing it come to a complete stop in a millisecond made me really question what i was witnessing. i have never seen or know of any human aircrafts that have those capabilities. 

i was needless to say feeling a little uneasy after seeing this and was confused as to what it was. i called my good friend over to watch it as well to make sure my mind wasn't playing tricks on me and sure enough, he saw all the same activity. i even went to the point of getting him to record the same program on his tv to make sure it wasn't something wrong with my screen and he was able to witness all the same things on his tv at home. 

ever since i saw that i have felt a little on edge and extremely curious as to what it was. i emailed the broadcasting company as soon as i saw it to get them to review the tape and investigate further but i never heard a response from them. 

unfortunately the only footage i have is on the dvr of my tv and when i try to record it to my phone so i can attach it to this report it is impossible to make anything out. i hope you find this serious enough to investigate and i will gladly meet with a field investigator to show then the tape as i am keen to get your input. 

i look forward to connecting with you.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed some sort of blue explosion close to the moon with green beam from earth

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my garden (sw facing) smoking a cigarette looking at the stars. it was a crystal clear sky with a fullish moon low in the sky behind my house (w/nw) and shielded by high trees, excellent for observing stars. there was small amount of low & very thin cloud to the s & sw. i became aware of a very bright red light low (30 deg) in the sky (ne) that flashed on/off approx every second & was travelling in a straight line (sw to ne). at first i thought nothing of it as it's not uncommon to see police helicopters hovering over the city and there is often airplane traffic in the sky (until recently i lived in west london under heathrow flightpaths and i'm well used to seing lights from airplane traffic & police helicopters at a variety of angles & perspectives). however there were no other lights visible apart from the flashing bright red light - normally aircraft have a green light & a white light in addition to a red light. the flashing red light was way brighter than i would expect on usual air traffic. i would estimate the light to be a mile away and right above oxford city centre & was silent. i watched the light intently and whilst it flashed off there was no discernible object or outline visible despite the excellent viewing conditions. the light then went behind a clump of trees but did not re-appear - i assume it disappeared or changed course. i had observed this light for about 1min in total. after 5 mins of looking at the clump of trees (the light did not re-appear) i turned my attention back to looking at the stars. i then became aware of another bright red light (exactly the same as the first) that had suddenly appeared low in the sky to the sw in some very thin wispy low cloud. this red light flashed as before & appeared to move nw to se in a straight line, again about 30 degrees from the horizon and again there was no shape or outline seen during the off phases of the flashing. after 20secs or so this light abruptly disappeared before my eyes and a series of much smaller & dimmer red lights (5-6 lights) began to flash randomly for about 10secs where i had first spotted the flashing red light for the second time. again no outline or shape was detectable. i waited for some more action for another 10mins but nothing happened so i went inside.

i observed these events very matter-of-factly & calmly as i've had a previous 'ufo' sighting 4 years ago that served to get the emotion & excitement out of my system. i'm only reporting it as there are likely to have been many others that saw what i saw - it was so low in the sky & directly above oxford city centre. i had an iphone on me but i didn't film anything as it was short duration and lights only - i know from experience that camera phones don't process night-time lights too well. also it was freezing cold and my non-smoking hand wasn't going to leave my pocket!

i hope this is of some interest/help
content.summary: Large flashing red light travelling in straight line then disappearing completely

content.detailedDescription: It was 5:50am monday, nov. 1, 2014, i was taking out my cat's garbage when i saw two round lights on the right side of my barn. my motion lights were not on, there was no noise,just these two rounded lights. when i returned from the garbage pickup spot, i looked down at the barn, this time there were three rounded lights on the opposite side of the barn. this particular spot, where the lights were, no human could possibly stand or set. then the lights just turned off. i wasn't frightened but found it strange. these rounded lights just hovered on each side of the barn and turned off.
content.summary: Saw two round lights on one side of barn came back and saw 3 round lights

content.detailedDescription: I have more but this is one of the amazing photos.Made with a digital camera. i have an eye for spotting abnormalities so you do the math.  i believe personally, that these might be the most amazing photos anyone has ever seen. period
content.summary: Photo of alien, transponding beyond the normal space travel.

content.detailedDescription:
First orb: light looked like a star and was going west then faded out.

then a few minutes later a block away...

second orb: light was going east to west and in the same path of the first light.  looked like a star at first, as it moved closer it got bigger and there was no noise.  it kept going west and eventually faded it out.

there were commercial planes nearby as usual due to the airport.   this was no plane.  maybe a drone?

a video is attached.  i edited the video for easier viewing.  nothing important or relevant was taken out.
content.summary: Bright orb - going e to w - no sounds- no tail lights.

content.detailedDescription: The land lord shut off our power to our apartment. so we cooked outside until we went to court. i was cleaning up after eating our meal, outside on side of house just outside our kitchen through a sliding glass door. i had just glanced up and saw the biggest thing i ever saw in the sky. it was huge! it was coming at me at an angle. turning and banking slowly as it turned. i was sure we have nothing on this plant that could be as big as it was, making no noise, and still maintain in the sky. only a blimp could move slowly and turn like it did, but as i mentioned, this vehicle banked as it turned. blimps don't! it could't be a decorated blimp or air ship, because it would of been to heavy and it was the size of maybe 100 plus average size blimps. it was ash black in color, with individual panels square-ish and rectangular panels like a jigsaw puzzle. you could see the outline of these panels accompanied with what looked like rivets on each and every panel. there were different colored lights not in any set order, all over the ship. the front of the ship was angled like a classic ship in the water at the bottom front of ship, going just above half way up. then it went into a aerodynamic 1/2 teardrop(on its side)like cockpit with no windows , but it matched the size of ship. i have a similar ship i found on ufo's i will explain later. the rest of the ship behind the ships forward tear drop cabin had what looked like small building of different sizes. with stacks and pipes that looked like testing equipment with lights of sorts on top and bottom of ship. the bottom not having any building or shacks just different testing equipment i will call them. the sides of the ship looked like it had 3 landing bays. there were dark shadows so you couldn't really see doors or openings. along the sides there appeared to be windows in odd places, nothing uniformed along the sides of what i would call the door jams of the bays. not to many windows maybe 15 through out ships side. they looked to be small and square in shape. the bays and jams were the only thing that looked uniformed in spaces. everything else like windows were just here and there no set pattern. the thing that got me was no noise. it was so quite, not a sound out of place other then the faint sounds of traffic on the nearby freeways and the slight sound of the breeze going through the trees nearby. when i first saw the ship my jaw fell opened the whole time i stared at this ship. i took in everything my mind would allow me to! i felt as if i was in a hypnotic state of wounder. never had quit that feeling before. even though it was like 3:00 am in the morning, i wasn't a least bit tired. and as this giant ship was turning like it was going to head towards travis air force base 13 miles away, just over the mountain top not but 3 miles away. i stopped what i was doing and went into the house and jumped in bed fully clothed and went right to sleep.Another odd thing was my girlfriend was doing something out front or inside the apartment. i should of yelled for her to come look at this ship. but it was like i couldn't speak. fortunately my girlfriend was seeing the same thing as i did out front. she experienced the same feelings. the next morning we exchanged what we both saw. this ship had no blinking lights of any kind. with the air base so close, there was no jets scambleing or anything i know of. the ship looked like it was something out of battle star gallaxia. i checked all over for air shows all over usa and hollywood. couldn't find anything to support this ship! if you look under ufo's listed as russia sept of 2012 you will find a long ship over the city video. the ship was same size but it has what looks like a turret underneath ship and no bays on its side. plus this is brown in color and the audio is really distorted and loud as it disappears through the clouds. i was so happy to find the video because it somewhat supported what i saw back in july of 1994. i just had to report this true event. it's been hanging over my head for so long as it's 20 years later as it's 2014. mufon has my full cooperation in any of these facts i have posted. i would love to tell them this story first hand. my ex girlfriend (now living on opposite coast) would do so also.
content.summary: Vessel appeared to have 3 bays on side, lots of appendages like testing equipment top and bottom

content.detailedDescription: Was outside with dog after my daughter left on the school bus.  looking up as i always do because i see things all the time. saw a solid white object just flying in a straight line from nw to ne. no sound. bright white like a light, but solid. got behind the tree and never came out the other side. just disappeared. pictures will say 10 am because i forgot to set the time back on the camera for daylight savings time.
content.summary: Saw an object in the sky that made no noise and did not look like a plane

content.detailedDescription: All i remember is i was somehow already outside and looking up at a disk hobering over my block. it had windows , i looked at the disk doe about 10 to 20 seconds and with the blink of an eye there was a streak and the disk was gone. after that something happened to the whole neighborhood . sex and more sex and crazy stuff. in 1996 i started having contact with people in my head. yes voices and pictures. it leads into the gang stalking  directed energy weapons and lots more. i am what is called a targeted individual . all of the ti's claim that the govt is doing this. im with a group called [domain redacted/cms/tg]  freedom from covert harassment and surveillance
content.summary: I was somehow already outside looking up at the metalic disk

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on holiday on the north shore, oahu, hawaii on 24th may, 2014 with a bus tour of about 10 people. i took this photo on my smartphone for the scenery. nothing unusual appeared or occurred at the time this picture was taken.I didn't download these photos until today, 10th dec.,2014. upon viewing them it is plainly visible that 2 bright orbs of light are visible both left and right of the photo in the sky and a 3rd orb is visible directly above the orb on the right but much smaller in size and perhaps further away.
content.summary: 3 ufo's caught on smartphone on north shore, oahu, hawaii on 24th may, 2014.
